Kettering.Dayton Christian High School:
Dayton Christian High School is a private, non-denominational Christian high school located in Miamisburg, Ohio, United States, educating approximately 900 students. Dayton Christian integrates Biblical instruction into its curriculum, but in generally vague matters such as soteriology, pneumatology, and eschatology. Regarding soteriology, the school states that "salvation is by faith and faith alone," but takes no position on "eternal security."
